textattack.attacks.attack module¶

class textattack.attacks.attack.Attack(model, perturbation)¶

Bases: object

An attack generates adversarial examples on text.

add_output_file(file)¶

When attack runs, it will output to this file.

attack(dataset, shuffle=False)¶

Runs an attack on some data and outputs results.

  • dataset: an iterable of (label, text) pairs

class textattack.attacks.attack.AttackResult(original_text, perturbed_text, original_label, perturbed_label)¶

Bases: object

Result of an Attack run on a single (label, text_input) pair.

@TODO support attacks that fail (no perturbed label/text)

diff()¶

Shows the difference between two strings in color.

@TODO abstract to work for general paraphrase.

class textattack.attacks.greedy_word_swap.GreedyWordSwap(model, perturbation, max_depth=32)¶

Bases: textattack.attacks.attack.Attack

An attack that greedily chooses from a list of possible perturbations.
